msbt.message: Well, I heard we've got some guests comin' from another island!
I heard some friends of yours from another island are visitin' today, . ?
Hey, I heard that these folks visitin' from another island know you!
Hey, shouldn't you be entertainin' your company from off island?
If I'd known about this, I coulda helped you roll out the proverbial red carpet.
Oh, and you are going to introduce yours truly, aren't you? I'll be on my best behaviorâ€”promise.
Are you bringin' 'em by my place? I better get to cleanin'!I can't let anyone see the way I really live!
I should be the head of PR for ,
